text: Lawrence Saltzman (September 28, 1926 â€“ July 17, 1992), also known as Larry Roberts, was an American actor and comedian. He was best known for his role of playing the voice of Tramp in the 1955 Disney movie Lady and the Tramp. He was also well known for his roles in the 1950s TV series Lights, Camera, Action!. ==Selected filmography== *Lights, Camera, Action!
